website_summaries.verdict: A great solution for occasions when you need seating for extra kids. Many customers note the pieces are challenging to fold – an intentional safety feature.
pros: Sized for elementary age and under
Safety locks prevent fingers and toes from getting pinched
Great for family gatherings or grandparents' house, since components fold down
cons: Some customers had trouble folding the table and chairs once opened, but this is a safety feature

website_summaries.verdict: A complete set that is fun to use and look at all at the same time.
pros: Table provides enough space for up to four kids to play and work at the same time

customer_reviews.title: The chairs are very sturdy and the table works great
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are very sturdy and the table works great. The problem though is the safety mechanism. There is a lever under the seat that you have to press in order to close the chair. The spring that they used is entirely too strong. I am a plenty strong man and it was extremely difficult to press the lever. All they had to do was use a weaker spring. I took the mechanism apart on all of the chairs and installed a weaker spring and now they work like a charm. This would be such an easy thing for the manufacturers to change.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Quie

customer_reviews.title: Trick to close seat / very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. My kid loves these. They are sturdy, I've had grown adults between 18 and 35 sit on the chairs and they hold really well. Folding the chairs back up is difficult because of the safety lock but I actually really like that feature - means my kid isn't going to have the seat collapse on her. Good trick to closing it = lay it on the side with the latch close to the ground and push down on it and slightly push the chair in. It's less of a strain/pain on your finger/hand and it is much easier/quicker.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Handy Little Folding Table and Chairs
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little set for kids. My grandkids love it. They eat at it and play at it. The only reason I rated it less than 5 stars is that the chairs are very hard to fold back up. It’s very sturdy; the adults sit there with the kids. The colors are pretty. Folds up to take less room.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Henrichs

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters love it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters (almost 3 and 20 months) love their table and chairs. They use the set for mealtime, puzzles, drawing, and games. After reading reviews stating that the table stains and tears easily, I purchased a 2' X 2' piece of plexiglass for the table. I sanded the corners in order to round them. Now it's easy to clean and and the tabletop is protected from tears. The table folds easily, but the chairs are difficult to close. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Theo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: this was an awesome buy. got it for my 2yr old grandbaby. its a must hv. i saw that some people had a hard time collapsing the set but they must have fixed the issue because mine folds very easily. its very sturdy and the colors are as pictured. its a God send for grand parents.
customer_reviews.author: Mahogany Wren

customer_reviews.title: Chair came apart after 4 days of use.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is only 16 months and 23 pounds so weight is not the issue. The back of the red chair came off. I tried to tighten up the screw but it seems to be broken. Super disappointing. Will be returning the product and getting my money back.
customer_reviews.author: sunny123

customer_reviews.title: Stained after first use. Wouldn’t purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: If you serve spaghetti to your kids this isn’t the table for you. It stained the first time we used it. I like how steady the table is and that it’s easy to unfold/fold but that’s about it. Maybe If the finish would have been a shiny material it would be easier to clean? I wouldn’t buy this again. Better deal getting one with cartoon characters on it because those ones have the shiny material and don’t stain. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for parents and grandparents to give
customer_reviews.text: Kids and grand kids find the most wonderful ways to use this colorful set. They eat on it, they use it to play store or as a kitchen or a place to play games or puzzles. It lets adults play with them (easier than on the floor) at their level rather than at a big table. It opens up their creativity and is a wonder to see how they use this as a set or individual pieces. One of my favorites is kids using blankets over the table and spaced out chairs to make a tent house for them to play in.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not meant to be left were moisture can get at it
customer_reviews.text: We have this table set and have had it for about 2 years. It is a great table and easy to store. However we left it on the screened in porch because that is where we eat a lot in nice weather. The description says for outdoor use, I would disagree. It is made of something that once the moisture gets into it, the table now sags in the middle. Its frustrating because now drinks spill because they cant sit flat! So bottom line I wouldn't leave it anywhere moisture could get at it. Other than that my twin boys love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Can’t clean anything off it - don’t dare eat spaghetti the first day that you get it. It will be ruined . If you’re a woman don’t even attempt to try to fold it . Just find a body builder with NO NAILS do fold the chairs down ... so pissed I payed $50 for this . I used to do carpentry (giant tomboy here) But I feel like the owe me for the $55 manicure that it destroyed . It’s one thing to be sturdy for the children but no rational reason for it to be this resistant. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Shane A.

customer_reviews.title: Great folding table and chair set
customer_reviews.text: Great folding table and chair set. My almost 2 year old loves using the table for arts and crafts, puzzles, playing, eating, etc. Really like that we will be able to use it for a few more years as well. All chairs and the table fold for easy storage. The only downside is that the chairs are a little hard to fold flat. I understand that they have a locking mechanism so the chair cannot fold up on a child (a plus), but it is really hard when you want to fold them up and put away. Because of this, we usually keep one chair open at all times and get the others out when friends are over to play.
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: really nice and has 4 chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected! good size; great w/the 4 folding chairs. and card table that folds. all are paddded too which i hadn't noticed when i bought this set. For 4 year old -- will be able to use for a while. already just likes sitting at it for just about anything! UPDATE 06/18: FYI. 6 months; still looks like new -- even with a 4 year boy using it and abusing it. And still comfortable; no tears.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute table an chair set, unfortunately, chair arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set at a nice price. Unfortunately, one of the chairs arrived broken. The fiberboard backing of one of the back pads snapped and was flopping around freely rather than being secured to the chair. There was a big sticker on the box to call the manufacturer directly for broken/missing parts. But, they said since there was no assembly required, they didn't have spare parts and to send it back to Amazon. Unfortunately by this time, the box had been recycled. Duct tape and glue it is!
customer_reviews.author: AD79

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations because my needs were so specific for a small table that can easily be stored. So pleasantly surprised that it’s sturdy, bright and colorful as well as super easy to clean and store. If you need somewhere easy for the kiddos to sit for school, crafts or a picnic that you can also stick in the closet to store, this works great! Seriously I have no stock in this company hehe...just a good buy:)
customer_reviews.author: Estee

customer_reviews.title: The chairs fold easily!!! No tools needed.
customer_reviews.text: I feel inclined to write a review because I feel that a lot of people who have written negative reviews because they couldn't figure out how to fold the chairs. I was having a hard time figuring it out but finally saw the little sticker that says "push down" at the lock and it works smoothly and efficiently every time. I hope this will help anyone who might be confused like me before. Such a cute table set and perfect for my kids when their cousins or friends come over. Just put away when they leave.
customer_reviews.author: Thanh

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we have limited space so having the power to disable fast and assemble just as fast was a major plus to save room and make the kids happy at the same time. I was extremely disappointed because all The tabs to lock and unlock the chairs are broken and don’t work. It’s a pain in the butt to close the chairs. The only good things are the colors are nice and the chairs are comfier than most. Not worth the money if you plan on folding the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: TheReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect.......
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Perfect!!!! So happy with this purchase. High quality, nice padding on chairs and table. Especially happy with the safety features. No worries that table or chairs will collapse unexpectedly .Grandkids will love it.!!!! Would definitely purchase again. PS. purchased from Amazon Warehouse. Stated that it was in good condition... all items in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Foxxylady56

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for my youngest grandchild who is almost three years old. She liked sitting at the big table with everyone else, but of course we had to use pillows or a booster seat. She ABSOLUTELY LOVES this set! It's just her size, and she can use it to color, or have a tea party (which she does).She loves having her own table and chairs, and it's very sturdy, so it is safe. I was almost put off by reviews that stated that it was difficult to fold - it is NOT! You just have to follow the directions, and there is only one piece to push in, and then the table and chairs fold up - EASY.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: nice table and chairs!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice table and chair set. The table is easy enough to fold...the chairs are sort of hit or miss. They're a little finicky but I do like that they're hard to close because it means my kid won't accidentally collapse it while sitting in it. The one thing I don't love is that the table has a much squishier top than I was expecting. The surface is easy to wipe down, but the softness makes it difficult for things like when we use it to color with crayons. Other than that, we love it. Great size and love that it comes with 4 chairs and not just 2.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Carpus

customer_reviews.title: Not for rough boys
customer_reviews.text: This as well as a toy organizer were both destroyed within 2 months. The set is a decent quality and built like an adult card table. The top is padded and can be ripped off down to the particle board... which is exactly what my nephews did to the table. The set is surprisingly sturdy after 2 months of use, just looks terrible. It is sad! If the children are regularly supervised during use and/or are not rough with things, it is a great buy. I may purchase another set to have at my home for when the kids come to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Julie P

customer_reviews.title: Tiny grandchildren love it
customer_reviews.text: The chairs have a fairly low maximum weight but seem sturdy. All pieces fold flat making them easy to store. My 18 month-old granddaughter loves it so much that she filled the other 3 chairs with her stuffed animals. It took a couple of tries to fold the chairs the first time, but it reassured me that they would not collapse with a child sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and good price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product for my 2yr old grandkids. When I took it out the box, they were so excited. The colors are so vibrant and table and chairs are sturdy. The chairs lock, so not easy to fold up on them while sitting. I am impressed so far. Would recommend👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Christine Harris

customer_reviews.title: Really difficult to fold back
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my toddler boys to use for activities, coloring etc. I expected that I would be able to easily fold and put them away in my closet when not in use. Not the case. They are really hard to fold back once you open them which means I’m stuck with more bulky kids stuff in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Hispanithiopia

customer_reviews.title: easily stained
customer_reviews.text: I received the table and chairs set yesterday and was generally pleased with it, although it's a bit flimsy. However, last night my grandson used it to eat pizza on (of course he had a plate but he is only 3) and he got some pizza grease on the table top. So far I have tried to clean it with soap and water, 409, Goo Gone, and Spot Shot and the red grease stains remain. I called the company and their recommendation was soap and water, although they said that they do not warranty upholstery (which is apparently what this is considered). I will be returning the set to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Soccerlover

customer_reviews.title: Great kids table and chairs set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my kids ages 4 and 7 y.o to originally have a place to sit at on thanksgiving. When I received it, I was very satisfied that everything was already built. Definitely a plus but there is one catch which is folding the chairs, its a lil tough to push. It will eventually close but i guess i rather that than have my kids accidentally close it on their fingers. All in all im happy and content with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C.R

customer_reviews.title: It is so cute, but my step daughters have ...
customer_reviews.text: It is so cute, but my step daughters have used it a total of 4 times and it is already torn in two places (one on the table one on the blue chair) and it’s stained! Not sure what stained it but I tried to get it off with cleaner, and it won’t come off. It’s really not worth the money. I wouldn’t have been mad if I spent $20 or less on it, but it’s too much for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Jens

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: This has stained, but I've had for 2years now. Still holding up. But mine has a rip now from the heavy use. I'm very pleased with how long it's held up. The chairs lock in place so kids won't fold in on them. Though when trying to flatten them, the locks don't want to come out. Very hard to put away. But I'd rather have that then collapsing on the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. Very well made. Great for the price. Fits my grandsons just right. (3 yrs, 1 yr) but the chairs will tip easy when the 1 yr old tries to climb on them. Other than that this set looks great, colors are bright. love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Vitale

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase in a while
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 yr old grand daughters bday so the kids would have a place to sit and eat, as well as do a little craft project for the party. Its perfect. My DDD loves it and uses it all the time, moving the chairs around to suit her needs. Its the first thing the kids go for when anyone comes over. Love that the chairs and table lock in place so its super sturdy. Easy to clean. Really a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Zavanna

customer_reviews.title: Chairs can be unfolded
customer_reviews.text: The chairs were nearly impossible to fold up once we wanted to put them away. My husband managed to do it after some time of messing with them. Everything else about the set was perfect, very sturdy, easy to clean and doesn’t take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: virtuousdiamond

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are very hard to close
customer_reviews.text: it's cute for the kids but I can't fold the chairs due to the latch even with plyers....I bought them for when the grandchild visit..now i'm stuck with an open chair. I wanted them stored in the box for when I needed it...i won't suggest buying it only for this reason
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this little set. Everything is sturdy, considering they fold. Sure, the chairs are a bit difficult to fold up, but I don’t mind. It just makes them “more sturdy” that a child isn’t going to collapse the chair accidentally. Our daughter is 20 months old and she just loves sitting at a table her size.
customer_reviews.author: Britt G.

customer_reviews.title: It’s sturdiness.
customer_reviews.text: The set looks great. The chairs were a bit difficult to unfold & refold which is good because the children can’t be playing around and one could pinch their fingers. But it does take extra time. The table & chairs all seemed fairly sturdy. When getting the set out of the box, we scraped the table leg and the paint did come off. The colors are bright. I think children 2 1/2 - 5 can use this table & chair set for eating & playing quite comfortably. I really think one piece of the set should have been orange instead of duplicating one color.
customer_reviews.author: Palatine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: This table set was really easy to take out of the box and set up to use right away. The colors are vivid and attractive. The chairs and table are easy to store flat for storing away, the lever makes it easy to fold. The whole set is pretty sturdy and gentle to touch for little hands. I think the set is big enough for children up to four or five years old. Definitely a good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mplaza

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: We have young grandchildren. Our old, multicolored table and chair set, was worn out. The chairs didn't lock anymore, and that is disturbing to me. So we purchased this set to replace the old. This works perfectly. I really like the tan color. We don't need everything in our children's lives to be in primary colors. This one color set looks nicer with our home.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Freewalt

customer_reviews.title: Ripped table 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time we ordered this table set and the first one we are so happy with, but the second one we received is damaged. As much as I want to return it we need this table for my kids school while they are virtual, disappointed that the table is damaged, while the box was not damage so I know the shipping was handled correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The folding chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I love all the different colors, so fun! I got this for my granddaughter and my future grandson who is due early August. I gave it a three because the chairs are hard to fold in! There is a lever to press under the chair, and it is very stiff for it to unlatch. Someone had the same problem that I read ona review. They push hard on the lever to release the lever. I tried that and it worked! I feel the manufacture should correct this problem. I hope the latch will continue to hold after many uses. We will see!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Graham

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grand kids to use at my house (also bought a set for their house about 9 months ag0) and we are very happy with the quality and safety features. Beautiful bright colors and sturdy. The chair and table legs lock and are hard to unlock, making it safe for children. I recommend that you save the box the set arrives in and use it to store the table and chairs in to avoid scratching or tearing the padded surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not functional for four children
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like that the table is teeny tiny. It's cute but with four children there is no room to do anything ...for 2 children it is alright , but not enough room for the four children. It took forever to get here , which I understand. However,I needed it for Easter. I may have to send it back because I need something a little bigger as there are four children
customer_reviews.author: Ana Bracamontes

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This product came damaged and broken. I returned it and received a new product. The second product was also damaged and broken. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Laura Reed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with nice soft top but STAINS EASY
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table and chair combo for our 2 boys age 3 and 1 to eat and do arts and crafts as their smaller one was getting crowded. The chairs are a little big even for my 3 year old but they still work great and my 1 year old still climbs up and down fairly easy. Nice stiff locking pins on the chairs so they can't unlock them and get hurt. The big downside is the table STAINS VERY EASY. This is from them just eating dinner and breakfast, as we just recieved the table yesterday... even with wiping the table down right away. Otherwise I'd give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Risdell

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Bought This!
customer_reviews.text: Table and chairs are sturdy as far as materials and design, however, is very lightweight and easily moved or toppled is you have very active kids. Overall, so glad I got this at Thanksgiving for visit from grandchildren. After dinner it was moved to family room where they colored while watching tv...and got a bit rambunctious.
customer_reviews.author: SonyaP

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my son's birthday party and the kids loved sitting at it. Love the fun colors and so far the set is holding up real well. We personally didn't have any issues breaking the set down for storage. Also, both the tables and chairs seem very sturdy and well made. Looking forward to using this set for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Sarahsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great kids table but not meant for crafts
customer_reviews.text: Great kids table but my kids already tore the table top padding after a few days. My 3 year old and 1 year old were coloring on the table and they somehow managed to rip thru the padding. The table is light weight and my 1 year old can push the table around. So I added rubber grippies to the bottom feet of the table and chairs.
customer_reviews.author: crsdina

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE OF TABLE STAINS
customer_reviews.text: THE VERY FIRST TIME MY TWO GRAND KIDS SAT AT THE TABLE TO EAT (PASTA) AND SOME OF THE (RED)SAUCE GOT ON THE TABLE IT WAS STAINED. I SAW THIS ON SOME PREVIOUS REVIEWS BUT THOUGHT THIS COULDN’T BE TRUE THE STAIN HAD TO COME OUT. IT IS TRUE SO CUSTOMERS BE AWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: n2bnme

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old granddaughter and had it shipped to her direct. I was disappointed when I finally saw it, how flimsy and cheap it was. She has had it over a year though but she is easy on it. No way I can sit with her on one of the chairs and play with her at her table.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi L. Royer

customer_reviews.title: ... that they were pastel colors rather that primary colors like pictured. Not my favorite but I can deal ...
customer_reviews.text: When I first took them out of the box I was surprised that they were pastel colors rather that primary colors like pictured. Not my favorite but I can deal with that. The table popped up fairly easily, the chairs were another story. They did finally open up after some struggling. Closing them is even worse. One of them took me a couple of mins to get it to collapse. I should be able to do it in a matter of seconds. We are going to keep it because my sons are already attached and returning sounds like a bit of a pain. I definitely will not purchase this again, though!
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing to complain about
customer_reviews.text: I think the table is perfect for the children. Nothing is wrong with its construction; it is colorful and sturdy. I don’t know what the fuss is about difficulty closing the chairs. The chairs are made in such a way that they won’t collapse for safety reasons. To close get a tool that can push metal button in and collapse chair. It’s quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Al

customer_reviews.title: our kids just love their furniture
customer_reviews.text: Our story time kids just love the table and chairs, and we don't worry about them falling out of the adult chairs that we were using when they do their crafts. They were difficult at first to fold up but when you see how they work it is not to hard. Liked the feature that lock the chairs in place so they cannot fold up on the kids. The colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: klm

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a little sturdier
customer_reviews.text: This table seems really unstable and rocks easily. I like that the chairs have locks so the kids can’t accidentally fold them up, but the table slides and rocks more than I would like. We have had a couple instances of drinks and food getting knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great to have for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Table folds up easily but chairs are more difficult to fold as you have to push in a metal button and simultaneously fold. It’s not easy. I do understand, however, that it’s because the metal button is to securely latch the chairs so they don’t fold in on the child and cause injury.
customer_reviews.author: VioletGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Make sure each part is fully locked before using.
customer_reviews.text: Each product locks in place and requires a little more strength than a child's to push the locks out. My toddlers have not even tried to close them. They love having their own little table for meals, snacks, and drawing time. Table top is cushioned, so I use plastic mats for stability.
customer_reviews.author: Abilene Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the 2+ yr old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the kids and such cute colors. You can fold it all up for easy storage. Love it
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Geandma's house
customer_reviews.text: Folding the chairs is a little tricky but it prevents them fro folding up on the kids. Nicely made and colorful. Just right from 2 to 9 year olds. Bought it for kids table at THanksgiving but use it all the time for puzzles and Legos. Folds compactly when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Storage and sturdy table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: This table and chairs was for my 3 year old great granddaughter for Christmas she uses it for crafts and meals for her dolls, most of all is that with 6 great grands under 6 then they all use their cousins table and chairs and feel like they are as big as the older children when we have family reunions also they are very sturdy and store easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry A. Luck

customer_reviews.title: not recommend for price
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. When we got the table one leg didn't lock so the table was constantly slanted or falling over. The quality isn't great for the price. The backs to 2 of the chairs have already fallen off and we haven't had the table for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Got these for grand kids. Very high quality, metal chairs with locks so they won't fold-up on the kids when they climb them. Quality is better than metal adult chairs I purchased from Walmart - I admit the Walmart's were cheapos but didn't expect stuff this nice for children.
customer_reviews.author: Flatwoods

customer_reviews.title: Affordable price
customer_reviews.text: The table set is nice. Great price for 5pieces . Table has soft surface which Is good for kids to play. But not good for writing or drawings though. The table and chairs are easy to fold and store. I also like the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: The colors are vibrant and everything is sturdy but I bought this set for easy set up ...
customer_reviews.text: The colors are vibrant and everything is sturdy but I bought this set for easy set up when I have the grandchildren here. Well it takes a construction worker to close chairs. All of us have a problem with closing chairs no matter how big of a person you are. On the bright side it won't fold up on your child. I would not recommend. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: About 3 x better quality than most little sets
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality children's table and chairs. table and chairs lock in open position, don't have to worry about youngsters getting pinched or collapsing on them. About 3 x better quality than most little sets.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Bergman

customer_reviews.title: The BEST purchase I have made in Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This set is just amazing!!! Top quality materials. Easy to fold and unfold and the chairs had a lock, thing that I loved. Both chairs and table are super cozy and I would say high-end for the price. I would purchase another just because it's SO GOOD, but it seems they are going to last forever, tho.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCISCO RIOS

customer_reviews.title: 20 month old thinks she’s ‘big stuff!:
customer_reviews.text: Both Grandchldren love so far, seems to be very sturdy. We have only had it for a couple of hours and they have wanted to do everything thing on it. The chairs are light enough for the 20 month old to move around and she has no problem getting in and out of them safely while the 3 year old has no problem scooting herself up to the table. I do see where people have a problem with the safety latch on the chairs but like the feature since they cannot accidently collapse the chairs on themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Beth O'Meara

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is what I expected. It is good for my kids and their cousins ranging in age from 1-4. Yes, it is hard to close the chairs but that is so the kids don't collapse with the chair so I am good with that feature. If you don't clean the surface right away there is some staining that occurs. Overall, I got what I expected and it is a good product for the price. I would definitely order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Heering

customer_reviews.title: Great Table For Kids
customer_reviews.text: Great table for kids. They climbed all over it and leaned back in the chairs and they never tipped over. I have a tough time closing them but that could be a good thing too...that means the chair won’t close on the kids
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: YES!  You’ve found what your looking for.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I went for this more expensive table and chairs. Awesome sturdy quality. Easy to clean. The chairs have a security lash so they won’t close and pinch my girl’s hands. You can fold everything away so storage. We even took the chairs to the park. My granddaughters love the set and so do we. Don’t look any further. These are worth every penny. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: CQO

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, minor problems
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are sturdy, but the unlocking mechanism (to fold them up) is garbage; it works properly on one of my four chairs. Plan to wear gloves and use pliers. The vinyl tabletop is easily torn, and there's a very thin layer of foam between the vinyl and the wood; not thick enough to provide any real cushion, but thick enough that it's not a hard enough surface for crayons or colored pencils.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is held up pretty well for my kids. The colors are great. It's sturdy yet lightweight. Easy to clean......for the most part. Wipes off easily but ketchup/bbq sauce did leave a stain but it's minor. Way more durable than the other tables we have bought for our kids. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: angellov

customer_reviews.title: my grandson's love this table
customer_reviews.text: the table and chairs are very stable. The chairs are tricky to fold, however that isn't a deal breaker. They are tricky because of the locking mechanism that keeps them open. If you lay the chair on its side, you can depress the locking trigger much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Mowafy

customer_reviews.title: Chairs not easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: I hope you have an engineering degree and/or brute strength to fold the chairs. Obnoxiously difficult locking mechanism that didn't come with instructions. Also, there is an amputation warning on them. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: tredog1

customer_reviews.title: Such a hit with the granddaughters!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 3 year old granddaughters use this table for eating, drawing and coloring, having tea parties, and playing with toy dishes. It is one more thing that has made coming to Nana and Papaw’s house fun. They use it so much that I leave it up all of the time. We did need to add rubber feet to all of the legs to keep the set from sliding around on our vinyl plank floor, but that was easily and inexpensively done. The set is sturdy and safe, with no risk of chairs folding up when weight is placed on the back of their seats. There is a safety feature to keep that from happening.
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: Really very nice for the price, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice set for the price. Only thing I would change is to have the table top be a more firm/ hard. It’s sort of soft like the chairs, but I still recommend it. Perfect for little ones to sit and eat, play, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we need to home school. The only thing I would have preferred is a more durable table top. It’s very soft and easily stained. We cover it with plastic wrap before crafts. Other than that, cute sturdy table.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanierez

customer_reviews.title: Foldable table and chairs for young children
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight and foldable. My grand kids 2 and 5 yrs old feel comfortable in these chairs and table. I like the cheerful color. I put them away at ease. I like this table and chairs set. Joanna F.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Hard to collapse, gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: The chairs definitely take some work to get folded down. That was a little aggravating. The table was very easily foldable. My nieces and nephew had dinner here and loved their dinner with each other. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Corneycakes

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: It is a very pretty set. Small and light weight.-it is easy to set up and put away. I can sit on the chair, as an adult, to color with my grankids, and it actually is pretty comfortable-small, of course, but comfortable. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Turner

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it and if they are happy i am happy too. Each chair come in different color which is easy for the kids to pick a color and that chair will be theres and no one can take it from them. Since that will be there chair from now on.
customer_reviews.author: marieangel

customer_reviews.title: very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set for less then one year. The table top padding is ripping, the chair padding is doing the same thing. For what I paid for the item, I am very unhappy on the quality. I put a tablecloth over it so it is not looking as bad. I have no way to cover the chairs. Sad I needed this for a birthday party and now it looks terrible for Christmas. so the company was contacted with pictures and they will not honor their warranty. I will never buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: skinny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for kids & very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2yr old. She definitely will get a lot of use out of it as she grows into it. Very sturdy. Love that the chairs click into place so they don’t fold up on their own. It took some time to get used to how they fold back up but I haven’t had issues doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Very cute buuuttt.....very poor quality, got our set in late February, all the chairs have some kind of tear or rip in them, the seats of two chairs is coming apart from the frame as is the table top.
customer_reviews.author: margaret rivero

customer_reviews.title: My Grands Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This table is great and cute! It has withstood my two- 2 year old Grands celebrating their birthday party and creating coloring masterpieces while sitting on top of the table! Very sturdy and cleans up very easily! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Their Granny

customer_reviews.title: Stains VERY EASILY
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this table, but almost every time my son uses it, there are more stains which I cannot remove. I have tried a bunch of different products. It seems to be absorbent somehow. Ex: pizza grease. He uses the table for eating and doing crafts. I am really disappointed with the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great item! My son loves it! Colors are nice and bright! FYI the chair that looks creamy colored in the picture is actually a yellow chair. Great buy at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: sj8687

customer_reviews.title: It was great at first...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the box. The colors are great and the set looks nice however, after 2 days the vinyl on the side of the top of the table started coming out and 2 chairs locked open availability the latch to close them no longer work. This could be a great product.... But....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected and chairs are difficult to close
customer_reviews.text: The tables and chairs were way smaller than I expected, but that was my fault for not reading the dimensions. The chairs are also not easy to fold up and I had to use a screwdriver to push the metal piece through to close them.
customer_reviews.author: Jultz642

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: I love this little table and chairs. My grandchildren were so excited to see it sitting in our playroom. The bright colors were terrific. Love the table, Dona
customer_reviews.author: Dona

customer_reviews.title: Looks good & all pieces work
customer_reviews.text: Just received the table & it works. The lock on the chairs will take some getting used to but I like the safety feature. The color is much lighter than pictured but I like it better than the darker color. Overall I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Keylala

customer_reviews.title: Cute -- and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as pictured. The chairs are very sturdy and will easily hold adult weight. I haven't had the set for long, so haven't had to fold up the chairs yet -- some of the reviews said this was difficult, but I don't know about that. They're very cute, serviceable, safe and I recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Already ripped after a week
customer_reviews.text: This table is already ripping my kids only use it for there homework and to eat so I don’t think a week after I use it it should already be ripping the table is hard to fold a kid won’t be able to fold it it’s not worth the price I should have bought a all plastic one
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Serious safety issues for little fingers!
customer_reviews.text: The table is garbage...for the price of this set, the quality is horrible! The table top does not fit closely to the frame on the corners and it is a serious safety issue for little ones. I can fit my finger in the gap. I can't believe they let this table get out the door. It is definitely going back!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves this set
customer_reviews.text: I keep crayons, markers, and paper on this table for my granddaughter. It is the first place she goes when she comes to my house. The seats are perfect height and she loves sitting on them.
customer_reviews.author: Diverse Interests

customer_reviews.title: My great grandkids love their new table and chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bright colored sturdy set. I know the chairs are made to keep the children’s fingers from being pinched. Problem is that it wasn’t easy for this old lady to get them folded. I had to have a friend do it. It is a very nice set, I will figure the chairs out someday.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table set for kids
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this set. Perfect size for her, well-made. Only complaint is that I have to use a tool to release the latch to fold the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy table ... a little small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for my nieces/nephews (ages: 1-6) when they visit for family gatherings and holidays. Pros: Table is super easy to set up. Easily collapsible for storage. Tables/chairs are very sturdy. Material wipes clean easily. Colors are as pictured. Cons: it is very small... quite difficult for an adult (6’ 1”) to sit and craft/color with the kids. It was even a little small for the 6 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use. Grandkids love ther new table and colored  chairs.
customer_reviews.text: What a nice table and chairs set. Very sturdy. Chairs have a nice safety feature that works well. Customer service is fantastic. First table had a rip in it. Replacement set arrived the next day.Very happy and you will be also.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. i thought it would be small like the other one that i purchased with PJ Mask on it. It is the right size. i have kids from age 4 to 8 and they all fit. Only issue is that the material of padding could be easily torn if not taken cared of but other than that its great.
customer_reviews.author: carol richards

customer_reviews.title: Cute but smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: They are very light and much smaller than the picture. My three year old can pick up the table and move it across the room. Best for younger toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Eve B.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what you get. great table my kids love it. it's also easy to clean and fold up and put away. I'm so glad it came with 4 chairs most of these tables only come with 2 chairs. Also great price. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: c. hone

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy of use
customer_reviews.text: Just love it. I sit there with my two little grandkids. 1 1/2 and 2 1/2 I would definitely buy it again. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jan B

customer_reviews.title: Table and chairs are cute but it was nearly impossible ...
customer_reviews.text: Table and chairs are cute but it was nearly impossible to fold the chairs after using. It took 2 people and a screwdriver to finally get them folded. The release mechanism just wouldn’t work on each chair.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Butera

customer_reviews.title: Great folding table & chairs for little children!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 3 nieces for Christmas. The table is still standing and the chairs too. My nieces are 2 & 3 years old. I think this will be around for a while. I am very pleased with this purchase. Plus, everything folds flat, so very easy to store. It is child size, but perfect for the “kids table.”
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Miller Butler

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture Kids Colorful 5 Piece Folding Table and Chair Set
product_meta.description: Color:BlueThis child sized folding table set is perfect for toddlers. Children can enjoy a table of their own for eating, reading, creating and playing. This table can be used outdoors so children can enjoy playtime outside or for a comfortable picnic setting. The easy to clean vinyl padded table top is great for toddler use. The padded colorful folding chairs are lightweight so children can easily transport their own chair. Overall dimensions: 12.5 W x 13.5 D x 21.25 H , Back size: 12.5 W x 10 H , Seat size: 10.5 W x 10.5 D x 12.25 H (all dimensions are in inches).
feature_bullets: Have a space for the little ones in your family to go to for learning, eating and playing. The colorful kids square folding table fits in any room in your home or daycare center. Safety feature prevents accidental collapsing.
Kid's folding table holds up to 70 pounds of distributed weight
Four folding chairs with 81 pounds static weight capacity
Vinyl padded with CAL 117 sponge foam, powder coated frame

Product measurements : Table Size: 24"W x 24"D x 20.25"H | Chair Size: 12.5"W x 13.5"D x 21.25"H | Seat Size: 10.5"W x 10.5"D x 12.25"H | Back Size: Back Size: 12.5"W x 10"H | Folded Chair Size: 13"W x 1.25"D x 21.25"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,885 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
